title: Wrap Cephes library for mathematical special functions
body_html:
The Cephes library provides many useful special functions and is used inside Scipy. The Deepmind folks wrapped Cephes for use in Torch (site, code).

Is if feasible to wrap Cephes for similar use in PyTorch?
body_text:
The Cephes library provides many useful special functions and is used inside Scipy. The Deepmind folks wrapped Cephes for use in Torch (site, code).
Is if feasible to wrap Cephes for similar use in PyTorch?
body:
The Cephes library provides many useful special functions and is used inside Scipy. The Deepmind folks wrapped Cephes for use in Torch ([site](http://deepmind.github.io/torch-cephes/), [code](https://github.com/deepmind/torch-cephes)).

Is if feasible to wrap Cephes for similar use in PyTorch?
